name.value: Foundation National Institute for Cancer Epidemiology and Registration (NICER)

description.value: The data item indicates the presence or absence of tumour cells in the walls of venous blood vessels, as noted microscopically by the pathologist. **Venous invasion (Variable number: 4.15)** in \'NATIONAL CANCER DATA DICTIONARY, V 1.1, Part A, BASIC VARIABLES for Adults, Adolescents, and Children\' see [Nationale Krebsregistrierungsstelle](https://www.nkrs.ch) > Partner im Gesundheitswesen > [Information, Grundlagen und Datenstruktur zum KRG](https://www.nicer.org/assets/files/krebsregistrierung/datadictionary_e-g-f-i.zip).
